ingredients.content: 480 g tinned chickpeas, rinsed, drained (2 x 400 g tins)
1 apple, peeled, cored and quartered, plus extra diced for garnishing
⅛ tsp ground cayenne pepper, or to taste

preparations.content: Place all ingredients in mixing bowl then blend <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then blend again <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>.
Transfer to a serving dish and serve with pitta bread or carrot sticks, garnished with extra diced apple, if desired.
